commands.description: This command initializes a motor and prepares it for use.

properties.name: motor_index
properties.description: The index of the motor to initialize.

commands.description: This command sets the speed of the specified motor.

properties.name: motor_index
properties.description: The index of the motor to set the speed for.

properties.name: direction
properties.description: The direction of the motor.

properties.name: speed
properties.description: The speed of the motor.

commands.description: This command sets the controller for the specified motor.

properties.name: motor_index
properties.description: The index of the motor to set the controller for.

properties.name: kp
properties.description: Proportional constant of PID

properties.name: ki
properties.description: Integral constant of PID

properties.name: kd
properties.description: Derivative constant of PID

commands.description: This command sets the target velocity for the specified motor.

properties.name: motor_index
properties.description: The index of the motor to set the target velocity for.

properties.name: direction
properties.description: The direction of the motor.

properties.name: speed
properties.description: The speed of the motor.

commands.description: This command deletes the controller for the specified motor.

properties.name: motor_index
properties.description: The index of the motor to delete the controller for.

commands.description: This command initializes an encoder and prepares it for use.

properties.name: encoder_index
properties.description: The index of the encoder to initialize.

commands.description: This command retrieves the current value of the encoder.

properties.name: encoder_index
properties.description: The index of the encoder to retrieve the value for.

response.name: encoderValue
response.description: The current value of the encoder.

commands.description: This command sets the specified pin to a low state.

properties.name: pin_number
properties.description: The number of the pin to set to a low state.

commands.description: This command sets the specified pin to a high state.

properties.name: pin_number
properties.description: The number of the pin to set to a high state.

commands.description: This command toggles the specified pin.

properties.name: pin_number
properties.description: The number of the pin to toggle.

commands.description: This command turns off the status LED.
This command turns on the status LED.
This command toggles the status LED.
This command initializes the platform and prepares it for use.
This command sets the velocity input for the platform.

properties.name: x
properties.description: X component of platform velocity input.

properties.name: y
properties.description: Y component of platform velocity input.

properties.name: t
properties.description: Theta component of platform velocity input.

commands.description: This command sets the controller for the platform.
